Class OFFlowMod

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, OFActionFactoryAware
public class OFFlowMod
extends OFMessage
implements OFActionFactoryAware, java.lang.Cloneable

Represents an ofp_flow_mod message

Author:
David Erickson (daviderickson@cs.stanford.edu)
